document.title: The Solution Structure of the Loop E Region of the 5 S rRNA from Spinach Chloroplasts
document.abstract: Few ribosomal RNA sequences have received more attention over the years than loop E, the internal loop that separates helix IV from helix V in 5 S rRNA (Figure 1(b)). The magnitude of the
